input_parameters.name: canvas_create_type
input_parameters.description: Type of creation. Options are `blank` or `template`. Default is `blank`. If type is `blank` or undefined, no `canvas_template_id` is needed. If type is `template`, provide a `canvas_template_id`.

input_parameters.name: canvas_template_id
input_parameters.description: Select a canvas template. Only needed if `canvas_create_type` is set to `template`.

input_parameters.name: content
input_parameters.description: Add content. Content should only be provided if `canvas_create_type` is set to `blank`.

input_parameters.name: placeholder_values
input_parameters.description: A dictionary of key-value pairs representing canvas variables provided only when `canvas_create_type` is set to `template`.
